sections.label: Verse 1
content: Twenty-five years I'm alive here still
Trying to get up that great big hill of hope

sections.label: Verse 2
content: I realized quickly when I knew I should
The world was made up of this brotherhood of man

sections.label: Bridge 1
content: When I'm lying in bed Just to get it all out
And I, I am feeling a little peculiar.
And so I wake in the morning and I step outside
And I take a deep breath and I get real high
And I scream from the top of my lungs

sections.label: Chorus 1
content: And I say: hey yeah yeaaah, hey yeah yea
I said hey, what's going on?
And I say: hey yeah yeaaah, hey yeah yea
I said hey, what's going on?

sections.label: Verse 3
content: And I try, oh my god do I try
I try all the time, in this institution

sections.label: Verse 4
content: And I pray, oh my god do I pray
I pray for sanctity for a revolution.

sections.label: Bridge 2
content: When I'm lying in bed Just to get it all out
And I, I am feeling a little peculiar.
And so I wake in the morning and I step outside
And I take a deep breath and I get real high
And I scream from the top of my lungs
